metadata.title: CVE-2018-13303 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
In FFmpeg 4.0.1, a missing check for failure of a call to init_get_bits8()in the avpriv_ac3_parse_header function in libavcodec/ac3_parser.c maytrigger a NULL pointer dereference while converting a crafted AVI file toMPEG4, leading to a denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-13303` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:4.0.2-1
libavcodec-extra - 7:4.0.2-1
libavcodec-extra59 - 7:4.0.2-1
libavcodec59 - 7:4.0.2-1
libavdevice59 - 7:4.0.2-1
libavfilter-extra - 7:4.0.2-1
libavfilter-extra8 - 7:4.0.2-1
libavfilter8 - 7:4.0.2-1
libavformat-extra - 7:4.0.2-1
libavformat-extra59 - 7:4.0.2-1
libavformat59 - 7:4.0.2-1
libavutil57 - 7:4.0.2-1
libpostproc56 - 7:4.0.2-1
libswresample4 - 7:4.0.2-1
libswscale6 - 7:4.0.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
ffmpeg package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:4.0.2-1').
mythtv package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
vice package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
gst-libav1.0 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
